name: SF-Marin Food Bank
description: Provides free groceries to individuals and families in need. No ID or income verification required.

name: St. Anthony's Dining Room
address: 150 Golden Gate Ave, San Francisco, CA 94102
description: Free daily meals served to anyone in need. No questions asked.

name: Glide Memorial Church
description: Three free meals daily, plus social services and support programs.

name: Mission Neighborhood Resource Center
description: Navigation center providing shelter, meals, and services to help people transition into housing.

name: MSC South Shelter
description: Emergency shelter with case management, meals, and housing support services.

name: Public Fountain - UN Plaza
address: United Nations Plaza, San Francisco, CA 94102
description: Public water fountain accessible at all times.

name: Public Fountain - Civic Center Plaza
address: Civic Center Plaza, San Francisco, CA 94102
description: Free drinking water fountain in the plaza.

name: Public Fountain - Dolores Park
description: Multiple water fountains located throughout the park.

name: Pit Stop - 16th St BART
address: Near 16th St BART Station, Mission St, San Francisco, CA 94103
description: Clean, staffed public restroom facility. Part of SF Pit Stop program.

name: Pit Stop - UN Plaza
address: United Nations Plaza, San Francisco, CA 94102
description: Staffed public toilet facility with handwashing station.

name: Public Restroom - Golden Gate Park
address: Golden Gate Park, San Francisco, CA 94122
description: Public restroom facilities available throughout the park.

name: Fixit Clinic - Bayview
description: Free repair help for electronics, clothing, bikes, and household items. Bring your broken items!

name: Repair Cafe SF - Mission
description: Community repair event where volunteers help fix items for free. Save money and reduce waste!

name: Hamilton Family Center
address: 260 Golden Gate Ave, San Francisco, CA 94102
description: Family shelter providing housing and support services for families with children.

name: Food Bank Distribution - Bayview
address: Bayview YMCA, 1601 Lane St, San Francisco, CA 94124
description: Weekly food distribution. Bring your own bags if possible.

name: Lava Mae - Mobile Hygiene
address: Mission District (mobile service), San Francisco, CA 94110
description: Mobile showers and hygiene services. Free toiletries provided. Check schedule for locations.

name: St. Anthony's Hygiene Center
address: 150 Golden Gate Ave, San Francisco, CA 94102
description: Showers, restrooms, and basic hygiene supplies available. No appointment needed.

name: Glide Hygiene Services
description: Free showers, toiletries, and clothing. Walk-in basis, first come first served.

name: St. Vincent de Paul Clothing Center
description: Free clothing for men, women, and children. Seasonal items available.

name: Episcopal Community Services Clothing
description: Free clothing closet. Bring ID if possible but not required.

name: Goodwill Free Clothing Program
description: Free vouchers for clothing. Job interview outfits available.

name: SF Free Clinic
description: Free medical care including primary care, dental, mental health. No insurance required.

name: Tom Waddell Urban Health Clinic
address: 230 Golden Gate Ave, San Francisco, CA 94102
description: Primary care, HIV/AIDS services, mental health. Sliding scale fees, no one turned away.

name: HealthRIGHT 360 Mission Clinic
description: Medical services, substance abuse treatment, behavioral health. Walk-ins welcome.

name: SF Suicide Prevention Crisis Line
description: 24/7 crisis hotline for suicide prevention and mental health support. Call anytime.

name: 988 Suicide & Crisis Lifeline
description: National suicide prevention and crisis support. Call 988 or text anytime.

name: NAMI San Francisco
description: Mental health resources, support groups, crisis intervention, and education programs.

name: California DMV - San Francisco
hours: Mon/Tue/Thu/Fri 8:00 AM - 5:00 PM; Wed 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM
description: State ID cards and driver's licenses. Bring required documents for identification.

name: Homeless ID Project
description: Free help obtaining government-issued ID for those experiencing homelessness.

name: Clinic by the Bay
description: Free medical, dental, and behavioral health services. No insurance required.

name: City Clinic SF
hours: Mon/Wed/Fri 8:00 AM - 4:00 PM; Tue 1:00 PM - 6:00 PM; Thu 8:00 AM - 11:00 AM & 1:00 PM - 4:00 PM
description: Sexual health services including HIV/STI testing and treatment. Free and confidential.
